parameters.name: enabled
parameters.label: Enabled
parameters.description: Toggle the erosion worms effect on or off.

parameters.name: density
parameters.label: Density
parameters.description: Agent density relative to the frame dimensions.

parameters.name: stride
parameters.label: Stride
parameters.description: Gradient step length applied to each agent.

parameters.name: quantize
parameters.label: Quantize
parameters.description: Floor gradient samples before steering agents.

parameters.name: intensity
parameters.label: Trail Persistence
parameters.description: Percent of the previous frame preserved each step.

parameters.name: inverse
parameters.label: Inverse
parameters.description: Invert the gradient direction to climb instead of descend.

parameters.name: xy_blend
parameters.label: XY Blend
parameters.description: Reserved for parity; currently unused in the shader.

parameters.name: worm_lifetime
parameters.label: Lifetime
parameters.description: Seconds before an agent respawns at a new location.

parameters.name: inputIntensity
parameters.label: Input Intensity
parameters.description: Percent of the source texture retained in the final blend.
